title: UI: Create tick modal
description:
Create tick button and modal:
- '+' button in header
- Modal with form fields:
  - Title (required)
  - Description (textarea)
  - Type (select: task/bug/feature/chore)
  - Priority (select: P1/P2/P3)
  - Parent epic (select from epics)
  - Requires gate (select: none/approval/review/content)
- htmx POST to /api/ticks
- New card appears in appropriate column
- Modal closes on success

AGENT VERIFICATION:
- Use agent-browser to click '+' button
- Fill out form with test data
- Submit and verify card appears
- Take screenshot

HUMAN REVIEW:
- URL: http://localhost:3000
- Create a test tick
- Verify it appears in correct column
